Section.name: About SVPCET
Section.description:
Sri Venkatesa Perumal College of Engineering and Technology, established in 2001, is managed by Tamilian Educational Academy. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur (JNTUA).
Sri Venkatesa Perumal College of Engineering and Technology AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
